basics.name: Marco Kaul
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Hi! I'm an aspiring fullstack developer experimenting with all kinds of technologies. My main focus lies on building foundations for maintainable and future-proof projects, incorporating the latest and greatest features that Javascript and the frontend ecosystem have to offer, always with a keen eye on performance and ease of use. Every great frontend needs a fast and reliable platform, so I've started dabbing into backend development and DevOps, building systems with serverless functions, Kubernetes, GraphQL and Prisma to scale easily and provide excellent developer experience. Also, I'm a design advocat and try to preach the importance of good user experience and design integrity whenever possible to build the best products.

work.summary: Netherstorm is the place for video game reviews
highlights: Participated in the 2018 ConsenSys Tachyon Accelerator
Developed business idea and MVP for a marketplace system with Ethereum integration
Designed & implemented new product direction based on customer and partner feedback

work.summary: Helpling is a cleaning services marketplace active in 10 countries around the globe
highlights: Developed a platform agnostic react native app for the Middle East branch that compiles to web and native
Refreshed different parts of the platform running in Dubai and Saudi Arabia, like checkout funnel and landingpages
Implemented a company wide design system using Foundation as the base that's being used on all Helpling websites
Developed business websites and intranets with Drupal and a B2B application suit for a major german marketing agency using angular.
Built and maintained websites with symfony and wordpress, rebuilt a flash application in pure javascript
